meanings.definition: The state or quality of being expensive or costly.
meanings.sent1: The costliness of the diamond ring made it unaffordable for many people.
meanings.sent2: The costliness of designer clothes often deters budget-conscious shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The costliness of the gourmet restaurant made the couple's anniversary dinner extra special.
meanings.sent4: The costliness of the rare painting was beyond the reach of most art collectors.
meanings.sent5: The costliness of the antique vase was evident in its exquisite craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: The amount of money required to purchase or obtain something.
meanings.sent1: The costliness of the new smartphone was justified by its advanced features.
meanings.sent2: The costliness of the vacation package included flights, accommodation, and meals.
meanings.sent3: The costliness of the concert tickets surprised the music fans.
meanings.sent4: The costliness of the car repair left him with a hefty bill to pay.
meanings.sent5: The costliness of the luxury watch reflected its superior quality and craftsmanship.
